name: Grand Ballroom
description: Elegant grand ballroom featuring crystal chandeliers, hardwood floors, and panoramic windows. Perfect for weddings, galas, and formal events. Includes tables, chairs, and basic lighting.

name: Conference Center
description: Modern conference center with state-of-the-art AV equipment, high-speed internet, and flexible seating arrangements. Ideal for corporate meetings, training sessions, and seminars.

name: Garden Pavilion
description: Beautiful outdoor pavilion surrounded by landscaped gardens. Features covered dining area, dance floor, and scenic views. Perfect for outdoor weddings and garden parties.
